item.title: Mentioned by Macleans.ca
item.description:
Would any governing party tolerate an MP like Brent Rathgeber?
At 2:11pm, Brent Rathgeber, the independent MP for Edmonton-St.Albert, took his spot along misfits row in the far left corner of the room. He turned to his left and shook hands with Lise St-Denis, the New Democrat who decided she wanted to be a Liberal, and ...
